body:
Comment 1: 
There is no such thing as two dimensional slicing.

The slice operation takes a value of type []T and produces
another value of type []T.  Doing it twice just does it twice.

x[a:b][c:d]

is the same as

y := x[a:b]
y[c:d]

It is not a double index.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
